actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain real property from the Secretary of the Interior to the city of Provo, Utah.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the city of Provo, Utah, without consideration, all interest of the United States in specified lands.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain real property from the Secretary of the Interior to the city of Provo, Utah.
